column1: Table 18. Prisoners under military jurisdiction, by branch of service, 2016 and 2017
Data source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, based on data from the Office of the Under Secretary of Defense for Personnel and Readiness, Department of Defense, 2016 and 2017.
Authors: Jennifer Bronson, Ph.D., and E. Ann Carson, Ph.D., BJS Statisticians
Table 18. Prisoners under military jurisdiction, by branch of service, 2016 and 2017
Note: Counts are for December 31 of each year.
a/Includes all prisoners under military jurisdiction, regardless of conviction status or sentence length.
b/Includes prisoners sentenced to more than one year under military jurisdiction.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, based on data from the Office of the Under Secretary of Defense for Personnel and Readiness, Department of Defense, 2016 and 2017.
